title: Client Update Open Beta Now Live

replies.body:
I love the aesthetic of the new client.
It has a very "fantasy" theme now. Clean buttons, segmented portions of the UI.
Great job riot!

Am I just a blind idiot, or is the option to upgrade to beta not appearing for me?

Click on LoL, patcher comes up as usual with news feed and whatever. No new buttons, so I click Launch.

Login screen appears, nothing different save for the little replay button at the bottom right for login animations.

Okay, I login...and nothing, it's all the same. no popups prompting client update, no new buttons in any submenus. What am I doing wrong?
I got the same problem still loking into it myself, I want to use the new client but I just cant due to the same issue.

I've switched back to the old 'legacy' client. Hopefully it won't make me do that every time now.

In general everything seems too dark and indistinct.

Almost all of the buttons are much harder to see in the top-level navigation (in this case literally along the top of the client). The rune page totals are now represented by icons instead of actually telling me what the stats _are_ (with tooltips if you hover). The mastery trees seem to be taking up more space without having gained any real clarity.

I didn't even look everywhere, I'm not pleased with what I _did_ see.
How do I get the old client back
lower right corner at the beginning of new client

Went to get the new client, download gets to 200mb left then comes up with an error "unspecified error occurred, please check logs for more info" how do i fix this stupid issue, have restarted pc multiple times, still does the same thing, ive tried letting it download 4 times now and same thing occurs each time when it gets below 300mb, any way to just disable the installation for this client and go back to original?
I was getting the same error so i decided to uninstall league, and then reinstall it in order to just keep using the original client without updating it.

I love the style of the new client and it really stands out compared to the old client but i have one problem with it which is the friends list that wont be able to minimize but everything is else is great {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I just want to take the time to say thank you and well done to Riot, the team and all the alpha client testers who have stuck around the 6 months like I have. You all deserve a round of applause, well done, keep it up! :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I was an alpha tester, and it says you need to login alpha client t to obtain the icon. After I updated the alpha client it became the beta client. Do I still get the icon?
Is it just me, but I can't find the Beta client even tho I had the Alpha before... Can't find it anywhere, not even in applications. Where can I download it again or just find it?
Happened to me the other day if you can't find It just reinstall the alpha client exe and agree to overwrite.
Not just you. I had it in my desktop and it dissapeared.

> [{quoted}](name=FaultLiner,realm=EUW,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=dPRzdvL8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-10T19:50:39.799+0000)
>
> Not just you. I had it in my desktop and it dissapeared.

Actually I just loaded my "old" client and it immediatly started the new one so. R.I.P. to the legacy client I guess
you have to go into league folder no shortcut is all, but be thankful you haven't now i only load beta client can't get into normal
is there no rotating game queue in the new client?
is it live on EUW? i don't get the download.
or is it bc i am on MAC?
There is an option in the lower right corner at the beginning of  new client . {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
to get old client back
1. cant spectate .
It was said that this would be enable later on in the cycle.
this lag is ridic, cant even change my masteries in a ranked champ select
buy a better computer, the world can't keep up with your wooden pc
I have a decent computer and the client seems rather sluggish.

Sorry if I'm completely blind, but can someone tell me the location of how many IP boots you have left in the new client?
Pls & TY.
I don't know how to change my name in this new client. Is riot deleted it out of store ?

I cant make a match so i can play by myself 
how do i add bots{{item:3070}}
Can you  at least fix games custom games to make it able for me to add as many bots as I like  because my girlfriend is new to the game and she likes playing 5v5 costom games against me!!!
same situation!!!
we can't speak in Chinese in chat
How do I join the Beta?  I was told there would be a button with which to join but it doesn't seem to be available to me.
I cant see where my win/lose board is, after game ends..... Im bronze btw

I believe I'm with a lot of people when I say that they like the aesthetics of the new client, however there are a lot of minor things that we don't like. This is the size of the small buttons, the lag for some users, not being able to minimise the friend's list, the location of some buttons which we have grown click in habit, the constant music that can't be muted unless you mute the sound effects and other things that I have forgotten but other players will probably bring up. I think that if the legacy client was used as a template and just "retextured" (don't know the word I'm looking for) using the look of the new client, it would be much better, otherwise players will just not like it.

People don't enjoy the layout and navigation of the buttons.

I understand that Riot wants to make LoL look nice and have a clean client, however please don't publish a permanent client for us until you have gotten A LOT of feedback, players just aren't simply happy with it right now.
Not a "Big" problem but the learn more button for champions when you click on their icon doesn't work.
I am getting black screen also not sure how to fix :(
When I go to open up the beta it just shows me a blank screen. Any ways to fix?
Can't copy and paste username or password on sign in
lol{{champion:1}}
So is the Alpha client changed to the beta with no additional download from a website?
I downloaded the beta client update but now i cant even open up league. It just wont load.
hey there is this problem mid
The client turns to black and no response... using the Beta client.....

Looks amazing, but when switching from browser like chrome back to the client, or when you select some options there are still some sections (especially corners) with black screens which don't show the full backgrounds. This seems to go away as soon as I go into queue though.
